com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognitoauth.util

Class LocalDataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognitoauth.util.LocalDataManager

  • public final class LocalDataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles tokens caching in the device local storage.

    Uses SharedPreferences in Android for local storage.

    Uses SharedPreferences to cache tokens.
